Text: RE BtoB Cc Will do Jeff if you want to chat Ill be happy to meet with youin person or via phone Ive spent the past year and a half in the BtoB space focusing on automated and electronic procurement processes My number is Best Regards Mike D Original Message From Cameron Sellers Sent Monday March PM To Mike Davenport Cc Jeff Dasovich Subject FW The contact at Haas is Jeff Dasovich and his email address is His work phone number daytime is Could you please send him the PRD as soon as you get it from Cherryl tomorrow Thank you so much Cameron Cameron Sellers Vice President Business Development PERFECTCOM Embarcadero Road Suite Palo Alto CA direct dial fax cell Original Message From mailto Sent Monday March PM To Subject RE already got the MRD Just need the PRD Tomorrows just dandy

Updated PRD Cc Sorry for the delay in the sending the PRD If you still want to chat tomorrow feel free to give me a call I am scheduled in multiple meetings throughout the day but will return your call if I am not at my desk My number is Best Regards Mike Davenport Original Message From Cameron Sellers Sent Monday March PM To Mike Davenport Cc Jeff Dasovich Subject FW The contact at Haas is Jeff Dasovich and his email address is His work phone number daytime is Could you please send him the PRD as soon as you get it from Cherryl tomorrow Thank you so much Cameron Cameron Sellers Vice President Business Development PERFECTCOM Embarcadero Road Suite Palo Alto CA direct dial fax cell Original Message From mailto Sent Monday March PM To Subject RE already got the MRD Just need the PRD Tomorrows just dandy PRD Final Version doc

RE Access to the Perfect DemoHeres the URL with passwords media UserName MARKET all caps Password MAKER all caps Demo Script In step choose Category Television Subcategory Commercial Profile Gen X this selection combo will yield the greatest functionality from the demo environment Within Gen X you can adjust the first six sliders to specifically weight the attributes You can also choose more requirements to specify even more attributes and weights as well as edit the ranges of those attributes When you click go the system is running our algorithm and will display dynamically who is competing and then show you the results Thats basically it Alot of the other features and functionality are still in development Be aware that this demo is totally confidential and should not be shared with anyone other than your team Take care Mike D Original Message From mailto Sent Friday April AM To Cc Subject Access to the Perfect Demo Good morning Would it be possible for either of you to send us the URL or whatever it takes to access the RFQ demo Thanks and have a nice holiday Best Jeff

RE Info ReqestSorry for the delay in responding As for initiatives I have a VERY tentative product roadmap that plots the Perfect course for the next months Heres what Ive come up with so far Keep in mind that anything past V is a pure WAG Also if you have any questions about any of the specific features just let me know and Ill try to explain Also keep in mind that the name so companies mentioned for the integration pieces is only tentative These are companies we are working with but have NOT finalized any formal agreements as yet Regards Mike D Original Message From mailto Sent Friday May PM To Cc Anil Sama Subject Info Reqest Hi Mike Hope all is well The PDR you sent us several weeks ago is very informative but a tad unwieldy Do you have anything that focuses in on what the major productsinitiatives are that youre currently working on eg develop capability to integrate ERP and supply chain management software what the major productsinitiatvies are that youd like to make happen a little further down the road eg months from now a description of those productsinitiatives the plan to execute on those productsinitiatives Thanks alot And have a great weekend Best Jeff ProdRoadmapdoc

RE Access to the Perfect DemoHeres the URL with passwords media UserName MARKET all caps Password MAKER all caps Demo Script In step choose Category Television Subcategory Commercial Profile Gen X this selection combo will yield the greatest functionality from the demo environment Within Gen X you can adjust the first six sliders to specifically weight the attributes You can also choose more requirements to specify even more attributes and weights as well as edit the ranges of those attributes When you click go the system is running our algorithm and will display dynamically who is competing and then show you the results Thats basically it Alot of the other features and functionality are still in development Be aware that this demo is totally confidential and should not be shared with anyone other than your team Take care Mike D Original Message From mailto Sent Friday April AM To Cc Subject Access to the Perfect Demo Good morning Would it be possible for either of you to send us the URL or whatever it takes to access the RFQ demo Thanks and have a nice holiday Best Jeff
